entry.data:
CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

entry.em: TUESDAY NIGHT AND NEW YEARS DAY
entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
